body_html: @gchanan and I decided that the way we'll fix this is putting the VariableTypeRegistry static initializer in the same compilation unit as VariableHooks, so that we can make sure that it gets run before we register VariableHooks.
body_text: @gchanan and I decided that the way we'll fix this is putting the VariableTypeRegistry static initializer in the same compilation unit as VariableHooks, so that we can make sure that it gets run before we register VariableHooks.
